I'm not surprised because a good Marcus Gilbert is a good Marcus Gilbert and that's what he is, said Steve Blake 's new teammate, Allen Iverson . But given Eric Schmidt 's success, the board clearly wants to retain his guidance for the next four years. `` It's a signal to shareholders that he'll continue to steer the boat,'' David Wise said. Eric Schmidt , 55, is being replaced as chief executive by co-founder Larry Page , 37.
